script.code:
n=$(curl https://api.keyvalue.xyz/3e0701bd/myKey) echo "key:[$n]"

docker cp $variables_CONTAINER_NAME:/root/darknet/predictions.png /tmp/$n/$variables_OUTPUT_IMAGE
